language.name: English
ctms.screen.title: Resource Packs Configurations
ctms.screen.open.tooltip: Opens the screen associated with the resource pack
ctms.screen.reload.tooltip: Reload the resource packs. You should use this if you added or removed resource packs from your resourcepacks folder
ctms.screen.config.reset.tooltip:
Reset all the options to their default values (§aON§f)

This will not reset the value of the blocks that are disabled by a Controls group
ctms.screen.config.controls.tooltip: Opens the §6controls §rscreen associated with the resource pack
ctms.screen.config.cancel.tooltip: Quit without saving the changed options
ctms.screen.config.save&quit.tooltip: This will reload the resources 2 times if the pack is a zip file, because we need to edit the zip file, which we can't do if Minecraft is using it
ctms.screen.block.parentControlIsDisable:
§cThis block is contained by a Controls group that is disabled.

To change its value, enable the group that contains it
ctms.screen.control.title: 's Controls
ctms.screen.control.noControls: This resource pack does not contain any Controls. This text should not be displayed, if you see this, please report it on GitHub or Discord
